long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Numintec for Chrome streamlines your workflow by offering essential features that make managing your availability and service settings easier than ever.

Key Features:
	•	Availability Management: Effortlessly manage your availability status directly from your Chrome browser, ensuring you’re always ready for action when needed.
	•	Default Outbound Service Control: Quickly change your default outbound service with a simple click, enhancing your flexibility and efficiency.
	•	Direct Agent Panel Access: Get instant access to your agent panel, enabling you to manage tasks and monitor performance in real time.

With Numintec for Chrome, experience seamless integration, better control, and enhanced productivity right from your browser.

Disclaimer: in order to use the Agent Panel shortcut, you need to have a Contact Center licence.
